title: Missing Mystery Skin
body:
Hello, Riot! I was just wondering where my mystery skin is. I haven't received it yet while many others have and it's been 4 1/2 days. I meet all of the requirements so I don't know why I haven't got it yet. The only offense I've ever had was a 1 day Leaverbuster ban when I was new to the game back in early S3 (I didn't know about that stuff back then). If you could get back to me it'd be wonderful and I would greatly appreciate it.
 Sincerely, *Raveion*

**PS:** If anybody else hasn't received their gift even though they meet the requirements, please vote in the poll pod.

replies.body:
You actually already got yours >.>

Myrmidon Pantheon.
When they said "rolling out in the next few days", (implying 2-4) did they actually mean longer? how long do you think it will take to get every one there skins?

We started rolling them out yesterday, so it hasn't even been a full day yet.  Some regions are done (because they're smaller) while others are going to take at least a few days more.  

It could always take longer if there is an unforeseen hiccup.  So far it seems to be going alright though, so everyone should get their gifts asap.

> [{quoted}](name=Hollymonster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oswIfQ1e,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-01-09T19:42:20.801+0000)
>
> We started rolling them out yesterday, so it hasn't even been a full day yet.  Some regions are done (because they're smaller) while others are going to take at least a few days more.  
> 
> It could always take longer if there is an unforeseen hiccup.  So far it seems to be going alright though, so everyone should get their gifts asap.

can you post this on top of the forums
I don't think I can do that.  I'll ask our dudes that can when they get back from lunch.
I don't really know if *you* know the answer, but is it just NA that is being rolled out and then EUW later? I play on EUW and don't really understand the rate at which this happens.
Nope, I know that multiple regions are rolling out at the same time.  I personally don't know how far along each is, so I wouldn't be able to tell you that - sorry!
Thanks anyway dude, 'Preication from Scotland.

Not a problem.  :D

Scotland is one of the places I want to visit most. >.>
but Japan D=
I actually went to Japan a few months ago!  Best vacation I've ever taken.  I'm for sure going back again when I can afford it again, hopefully in spring. :D

What. You're way too lucky. Nerf that luck. I want to go to Japan, too =C

take a +1 though
So about how many days would it take for all of NA to get their gifts?? Pretty big place. I'm guessing maybe not until the weekend for some.
I don't think so I think they meant over the next week

Can i please get one, my computer would shutdown getting me banned. I then wouldnt be able to reconnect. I have been positive all year and never got chat restricted ever. I never would  afk on purpose. Please

lol been positive all year my ass. after seeing how toxic u were to ur team after feeding i doubt ur the saint u claim to be. o btw if anyone wants to see this for a good laugh.

http://s10.postimg.org/f9wrwlp09/lololol.png

http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/fr/summoner/na/CrimsonProphet

0 pentas 42% win rate overall negative kda

i dont see how someone can suck this bad and be as toxic as they r all at the same time.
Yeah, I got it later that day but when I posted this I hadn't received it.

Hi. I was wondering why i had not yet recieved mty mystery skin all of my friends who live in my same town have gotten theres yet i have not recived mine i checked my gifting history incase client bugged but nothing. I do not recll ever getting punished for anything is there anyway you could maybe give some insight on this. thankyou if you can

Uhhhhhh, I'm pretty sure they're not being given out by location.  Please be patient, there are a lot of gifts going out and they aren't done yet.

If you're eligible, you'll get one eventually.

ok thankyou for clearing that I was actually kinda worried like my neighbor got his skin but i didnt get mine i even went through every email ive had throurgh riot just to make sure i didnt get banned and didnt know
i have not receive mines yet everybody has one instead of me
i still havent gotten mine :/ i havent gotten as much as a warning for being salty.

I got mine today, I read this article on a "gaming news" site; saying that Riot Games was giving out free Mystery Skins. Now I read this 2 days ago, 7th of January, and the article was posted on the 6th. According to the article it says, "*Riot intends to continue rewarding positive behavior in this fashion moving into 2015. *" If they do continue you should get yours soon. I know someone who has 2 already, or at least he says. It as well states, "*However, to give more context about this extrinsic reward, the key is that it is a surprise and not deterministic. What I mean by this is that it isn't some kind of achievement system where you are sportsmanlike for your next 10 games, then directly unlock a mystery gift. If you design a system like this, players will simply behave for 10 games, unlock their mystery gift, and go back to their normal ways.*" I've looked at some of the comments, and some say that about things from past seasons, not taking place in 2014. Rito intends to release a mystery skin to all players who managed to make it through 2014 without being banned or punished for poor behavior. Anyone who didn't receive a chat restriction, ranked restriction, 14-day-ban or permanent ban meets the requirements. Which probably most of you know. 

This took me like a good 25 minutes to write, well I hope I helped. 

TL;DR: Be patient.
I'm waiting for mine too. :(
I just logged in to the clien today and I didn't receive a skin. Did I miss it? :x

Be patient, but don't GTFO. Better?? >=D
